name: SnakeWise
description:
A 2d puzzle Platformer that uses the concept of the classic snake game. 

You are a snake who must navigate through a series of puzzles to get to the finish! 

When you finish the game you will also be able to play the classic snake from the menu.

Controls:

To move you can use the Arrow Keys:

If you want to pause the game you can use the Escape Key

*Note: You are able to disable the CRT Effect if you are not a fan of it from the options either from the menu or when paused. 

Credit to Kenney for the amazing art!
